flawed_nl_solution:
The colony had 1077 - 129 = <<1077-129=984>>984 penguins in it at the beginning of this year.
At the beginning of the second year, the colony had 984 / 3 = <<984/3=328>>328 penguins in it.
At the beginning of the first year, it had 328 / 2 = <<328/2=164>>164 penguins in it.
Thus, at the beginning of the first year, the penguin colony was catching 164 * 3/2 = 246 fish per day.
#### 246

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 948, not 984. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
